00037     {
00038         $data = array();
00039         if (strpos($rule_string, "#")) {
00040             $data['comment'] = substr($rule_string, strpos($rule_string, "#") + '1');
00041             $rule_string =  substr($rule_string, '0', strpos($rule_string, "#"));
00042         }
00043 
00044         /*
00045          * Sanitize the rule string so that we can deal with '{foo' as '{ foo' in 
00046          * the code further down without any special treatment
00047          */
00048         $rule_string = preg_replace("/! +/", "!",   $rule_string);
00049         $rule_string = preg_replace("/{/", " { ",   $rule_string);
00050         $rule_string = preg_replace("/}/", " } ",   $rule_string);
00051         $rule_string = preg_replace("/\"/", " \" ",   $rule_string);
00052 
00053         foreach (preg_split("/[\s,\t]+/", $rule_string) as $rule) {
00054             $rules[] = $rule;
00055         }
00056         for ($i = '0'; $i < count($rules); $i++) {
00057             switch ($rules[$i]) {
00058             case "rdr":
00059                 $data['type'] = "rdr";
00060                 break;
00061             case "no":
00062                 $data['type'] = "no ". $rules[++$i];
00063                 break;
00064             case "nat":
00065                 $data['type'] = "nat";
00066                 break;
00067             case "binat":
00068                 $data['type'] = "binat";
00069                 break;
00070             case "pass":
00071                 $data['pass'] = true;
00072                 break;
00073             case "nat-anchor":
00074             case "rdr-anchor":
00075             case "binat-anchor":
00076               $data['type'] = $rules[$i++];
00077               if ($rules[$i] == "\"") {
00078                 $data['identifier'] = $rules[++$i];
00079                 if ($rules[$i + 1] == "\"") {
00080                   $i++;
00081                 }
00082               } else {
00083                 $data['identifier'] = $rules[$i];
00084               }
00085               break;
00086             case "netmask":
00087               $data['netmask'] = $rules[++$i];
00088               break;
00089             case "random":
00090             case "source-hash":
00091             case "round-robin":
00092             case "static-port":
00093             $data[$i++] = true;
00094             break;
00095             case "on":
00096               list($data['interface'], $i) = $this->parseItem($rules, $i);
00097                 break;
00098             case "proto":
00099               list($data['proto'], $i) = $this->parseItem($rules, $i);
00100                 break;
00101             case "from":
00102                 $data['from'] = $rules[++$i];
00103                 if ($rules[$i+'1'] == "port") {
00104                     $i += '2';
00105                     $data['fromport'] = $rules[$i];
00106                 }
00107                 break;
00108             case "to":
00109                 $data['to'] = $rules[++$i];
00110                 break;
00111             case "port":
00112                 $data['port'] = $rules[++$i];
00113                 break;
00114             case "->":
00115                 $data['natdest'] = $rules[++$i];
00116                 if ($rules[$i+'1'] == 'port') {
00117                     $i += '2';
00118                     $data['natdestport'] = $rules[$i];
00119                 }
00120             }
00121         }
00122         return $data;
00123     }

00126     {
00127         $data = "";
00128         if ($this->rules) {
00129             foreach ($this->rules as $rule) {
00130                 if ($rule['type'] == 'comment') {
00131                     $lines = preg_split("/\n/", stripslashes($rule['comment']));
00132                     $data .= "\n";
00133                     foreach ($lines as $line) {
00134                         $data .= "# ". $line. "\n";
00135                     }
00136                     continue;
00137                 }
00138                 $data .= $rule['type'];
00139                 if ($rule['pass']) {
00140                     $data .= " pass";
00141                 }
00142                 if ($rule['identifier']) {
00143                   # Rule type is anchor, nat-anchor or binat-anchor
00144                   $data .= " \"". $rule['identifier']. "\"";
00145                 }
00146                 if ($rule['interface']) {
00147                   $data .= $this->generateItem($rule['interface'], "on");
00148                 }
00149                 if ($rule['proto']) {
00150                     $data .= $this->generateItem($rule['proto'], "proto");
00151                 }
00152                 if ($rule['from']) {
00153                     $data .= " from ". stripslashes($rule['from']);
00154                 } else if ($rule['type'] <> ("nat-anchor" || "binat-anchor" || "rdr-anchor")) {
00155                     $data .= " from any ";
00156                 }
00157                 if ($rule['to']) {
00158                     $data .= " to ". stripslashes($rule['to']);
00159                 } else if ($rule['type'] <> ("nat-anchor" || "binat-anchor" || "rdr-anchor")) {
00160                     $data .= " to any ";
00161                 }
00162                 if ($rule['port']) {
00163                     $data .= " port ". $rule['port'];
00164                 }
00165                 if ($rule['natdest']) {
00166                   $data .= " -> ". stripslashes($rule['natdest']);
00167                   if ($rule['natdestport']) {
00168                       $data .= " port ". $rule['natdestport'];
00169                   }
00170                 }
00171 
00172         if ($rule['netmask']) {
00173           $data .= " netmask ". $rule['netmask'];
00174         }
00175         if ($rule['random']) {
00176           $data .= " random";
00177         }
00178         if ($rule['source-hash']) {
00179           $data .= " source-hash";
00180         }
00181         if ($rule['static-port']) {
00182           $data .= " static-port";
00183         }
00184 
00185                 if ($rule['comment']) {
00186                     $data .= " # ". trim(stripslashes($rule['comment']));
00187                 }
00188 
00189                 $data .= "\n";
00190             }
00191         }
00192         return $data;
